statements: UPDATE neural_network_weights SET weight_matrix = '\x01' WHERE layer_name = 'input';
UPDATE neural_network_weights SET updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE layer_name = 'hidden';
UPDATE neural_network_weights SET weight_matrix = E'\x01020304' WHERE layer_name = 'hidden_layer'
UPDATE neural_network_weights SET updated_at = NOW() WHERE layer_name = 'output_layer'
UPDATE neural_network_weights SET weight_value = 0.5 WHERE weight_id = 1;
UPDATE training_updates SET new_weight_value = 0.8, iteration_num = 10 WHERE updated_weight_id = 5;
UPDATE neural_network_weights SET weight_value = 0.5 WHERE layer_num = 1;
UPDATE training_updates SET new_weight_value = 0.3, iteration_num = 10 WHERE updated_weight_id = 2;
UPDATE neural_network_weights SET weight_matrix = '\x010203' WHERE layer_id = 1;
UPDATE training_logs SET loss = 0.15, start_time = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE log_id = 10;
UPDATE neural_network_weights SET weight_matrix = E'\\\x0123456789ABCDEF' WHERE layer_id = 1;
UPDATE training_data SET input_data = E'\\\xAAFF0011BB' , target_data = E'\\\xBB00FF11AA' WHERE data_id = 100;
UPDATE neural_network_weights SET weight_matrix = :new_weight_matrix WHERE layer_name = :layer_name
UPDATE model_parameters SET value = :new_value WHERE parameter_name = :param_name
UPDATE neural_network_weights SET weight_matrix = E'\\x010203' WHERE layer_name = 'hidden_layer';
UPDATE model_parameters SET value = 0.78 WHERE parameter_name = 'learning_rate';
UPDATE neural_network_weights SET weight = 0.5 WHERE layer_id = 1 AND neuron_id = 3;
UPDATE model_parameters SET parameter_value = 0.75 WHERE parameter_name = 'learning_rate';
UPDATE neural_network_weights SET weight = 0.5 WHERE layer_id = 1 AND neuron_id = 2;
UPDATE model_parameters SET parameter_value = 0.001 WHERE parameter_name = 'learning_rate';
